description: After an incredible cob loaf recipe? Try this Mexican-inspired bean and cream cheese filling with smashed avocado and spicy salsa topping.
name: Mexican-Inspired Bean Cob Loaf Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer cob to a platter. Top with avocado, corn mixture and extra coriander. Serve with cubed bread, cucumber and lime wedges.
